title: Chapter 4417 - Chapter 4417: 4416
body:
Chapter 4417 - Chapter 4417: 4416

Chapter 4417: 4416

“Boom! Boom! Boom!”

“Boom! Boom! Boom!”

A terrifying collision sound rang out in the void.

Wang Xian’s body resisted the giant’s attack head-on.

Similarly, Wang Xian’s attack landed on the giant’s body.

“Bang!”

The powerful attack force caused Wang Xian’s body to fly backward. A large amount of blood oozed out from his body.

There was also a large amount of dragon blood oozing out from the dragon’s mouth.

Wang Xian was injured after receiving this attack.

The ancestral tree in his body emitted a powerful energy glow to heal his injuries.

“Boom!”

In front of him, the huge giant of faith suffered a powerful attack from Wang Xian and was directly penetrated through a huge hole.

The powerful energy impact caused the faces of the kings of the gods to turn pale. They were filled with fear.

“Attack!”

“Boom! Boom! Boom!”

At this moment, Mo Sha’s and the others’voices sounded. Then, they exploded with all their strength and attacked the giant’s cave entrance.

“Block, Block!”

The expression of the first God Palace master changed drastically when he saw this scene and he shouted sternly.

He didn’t expect that the Dragon King would risk getting injured to stop them.

This was to prevent him from breaking through!

Boom! Boom

Before he could think, a huge amount of energy charged at him again.

The kings of the gods turned pale and revealed terrified expressions.

Their faces were pale as they poured in powerful energy to resist the attacks of the experts from the Dragon Palace.

However, the belief giants who had already broken through a hole couldn’t perfectly help them resist this attack.

Under the powerful energy impact, the expressions of all the kings of gods changed dramatically.

Pu

Instantly, more than ten kings of gods spat out blood.

“No, Lord God One Palace Master, we have to escape. Otherwise, we’re finished!”

One of the kings of gods said in fear!

“Find a chance to escape!”

God One Palace master immediately replied.

They had to escape immediately.

Otherwise, if they continued to be entangled like this, they wouldn’t be a match for the other party at all.

“You want to escape? It Won’t be so easy. Let’s decide the outcome here!”

Wang Xian wiped the blood from the corner of his mouth and stared coldly at the first God Palace Master and the rest.

“Roar Roar!”

He growled in a low voice and instantly unleashed all his strength. He attacked the giant of faith once again.

“Assist the Dragon King.”

Mo Sha and the rest, who were at the back, immediately shouted when they saw him.

Following that, they surrounded Wang Xian with streams of defensive power.

They reinforced Wang Xian’s defense.

“That Dragon King is attacking again!”

“Defend!”

Seeing Wang Xian attacking again, the kings of the gods roared loudly!

This time, they chose to defend instead of attacking.

“Boom! Boom! Boom!”

“Boom! Boom! Boom!”

However, their defense was in the face of Wang Xian’s continuous violent attacks.

Cracks appeared once again at the hole that had just been mended!

“Attack! We will attack with our full strength when the other party is defending. We will assist the Dragon King when the other party is attacking!”

Mo Sha also ordered loudly at this moment.

“Boom Boom Boom!”

“Boom Boom Boom!”

All sorts of terrifying attacks smashed towards the faith giant. The entire space seemed to be a terrifying apocalypse.

Within a few million light years, everything was deathly silent.

Any living being that approached would be killed by the terrifying energy shockwaves.

“Palace head Qian Yuan, can you use your area-of-effect escape treasure and bring us away!”

Upon seeing such a violent attack, the expression of palace master Shenyi changed drastically as he shouted.

“No, Palace Master Shenyi. The area-of-effect escape treasure needs to envelop all of you. However, you can not resist and can not use any attacks during the period of being enveloped.”

Palace Master Qianyuan replied with an embarrassed expression.

This kind of escape treasure that could lead everyone to escape required some conditions.

Just like how an lie led Wang Xian and the rest to teleport, they could not put up any resistance first.

When they released their attacks, it represented a form of resistance.

Under such circumstances, an area-of-effect attack would not be successful.

“Damn it!”

“We have to stop the Dragon King’s violent attack. Otherwise, we will be finished!”

The Sacred Palace master roared with his eyes wide open!

“You Want to kill us? If you want to kill us, even if you are at the level of chaos, you will have to pay a terrible price!”

The Holy Palace Master roared with a face full of killing intent, “Attack the Dragon King!”

He controlled the giant of faith.

The giant of faith emitted a terrifying energy from its mouth and shot toward Wang Xian!

“Assist the Dragon King!”

Mo Sha and the others at the back saw this scene. Immediately, streams of energy covered Wang Xian’s surroundings.

“Roar!”

When Wang Xian saw this attack, he didn’t resist at all. He also opened his dragon mouth and prepared a terrifying attack.

“Roar! Roar!”

An attack that contained all kinds of energy attacked the body of the giant of faith.

His attack missed the opponent’s attack.

Similarly, he exchanged injuries for injuries!

However, this time, Mo Sha and the rest set up layers of defense in front of Wang Xian.

“Boom! Boom! Boom!”

“Boom! Boom! Boom!”

The sound of collision rang out once again.

Wang Xian’s dragon breath penetrated the giant of faith once again.

The kings of the gods trembled violently and spat out a large amount of blood again.

Their power of faith was channeled crazily into the giant of faith.

“Boom!”

In front of Wang Xian, the blow from the giant of faith shattered the layers of defense in front of Wang Xian.

Once again, his body couldn’t help but fly backward.

However, this time, it didn’t cause too much damage to Wang Xian.

The defense of Mo Sha and the rest was of great use!

“Attack!”

The group of experts from the Dragon Palace quickly launched the second round of attacks.

All kinds of powerful Heaven’s origin force attacked the entrance of the giant of Faith’s Cave.

The faces of the kings of gods turned pale. Some of them started bleeding from their eyes, ears, and noses.

The believers behind them started to collapse and dissipate.

“Kill!”

Wang Xian flew over again and attacked the giant continuously!

Fight!

It was a complete fight!

Wang Xian’s attacks caused the kings of gods to have no time to rest.

Next, it was a competition of endurance.

It was a competition of vitality.

Wang Xian did not allow them to escape.

And if the kings of the gods wanted to escape, they had to exhaust Wang Xian’s energy!

“Kill, Let’s fight it out with them. Our belief universe is invincible!”

Palace Master Shenyi and the rest had obviously realized this as well. They roared with murderous intent.

They were all old monsters who had lived for countless years.

Although they cherished their lives, they did not hesitate when it was time to fight.

Kill!

Only by killing could they kill their way out!

So what if they were existences at the chaos level?

“Alright!”

Wang Xian could feel their murderous intent. A strong desire to fight shot out from his eyes!
